error.message: Parameter $alias_manager of method Drupal\easy_google_analytics_counter\ConnectionService::__construct() has typehint with deprecated interface Drupal\Core\Path\AliasManagerInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\path_alias\AliasManagerInterface.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to easy_google_analytics_counter.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
